name: The Great Bicycle Mystery SURVIVAL EDITION - FOR ZDAEMON USE
description: The Great Bicycle Mystery is a 15 level megawad for cooperative Doom II play for 2-4 people. This wad is a revised version of bmystery.wad. Balance issues have been fixed and bugs eliminated. This version includes a survival mode with the maps. bmystery_surv1.wad fixes the crashing that happened in bmystery_surv.wad.
